version.body:
I found a temporary workaround, not sure if it's correct but it works in my case:
https://rails.lighthouseapp.com/projects/8994-ruby-on-rails/tickets/2564-acrequestcontent_type-should-return-a-string
Just add:
module Mime
class Type def split(*args) to_s.split(*args) end end
end
to a config/initializers class file.
HTH, ian
